flavor_text:
It carries a seed
on its back right
from birth. As it grows older, the
seed also grows
larger.

While it is young,
it uses the
nutrients that are stored in the
seeds on its back
in order to grow.

BULBASAUR can be seen napping in
bright sunlight.
There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sunâ€™s rays, the seed
grows progressively larger.
